title: Wet Town Traitor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you will roll three Town Support roles, and may choose one to gain the abilities and attributes of.
- Your existence will be notified to all players.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You may choose one of the two Town Support roles you discarded at the beginning of the game to gain the abilities and attributes of. Alternatively, you may choose to roll a completely new Town Support role. You may multitask your separate roles.
- Complete detection immunity. You may choose a role at any time to appear to be when investigated.

desc:
Post 2689
*This is definitely what WTT stands for yep yup*
